job description:
Summary: Data Trust is currently seeking a Data Operations Analyst, a full-time position, who will work with the data operations team. The Data Operations Analyst is responsible for helping to create and manage the maintenance and development of the processes associated with our underlying databases.

About Us: Data Trust is a young dynamic political data organization focused on center-right leaning advocacy and support.

Responsibilities:
  • Develop data flow processes
  • Research and implement features to improve the efficiency and reliability of the data infrastructure
  • Assist coworkers in writing efficient queries
  • Research and implement features to improve the efficiency and reliability of the data infrastructure
Qualifications:
  • Experience with SQL is required.
  • Experience with other programing languages, including, but not limited to, Python, R, C#, and C++ is helpful, but not required.
  • Able to diagnose and troubleshoot database related problems
